# Issue Report

Thank you for your interest in this project.

## Before Opening an Issue

Please review the existing documentation:
- [README.md](../README.md) - Project overview and setup
- [PREPROCESSING_GUIDE.md](../PREPROCESSING_GUIDE.md) - Data preparation

## Contact

For questions, bug reports, or suggestions, please contact:

**Email**: fontanieraxelpro@gmail.com

## Information to Include

When reaching out, please provide:

**For technical issues**:
- Description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce
- Error messages or screenshots
- Environment details (browser, Colab runtime, etc.)

**For methodology questions**:
- Specific aspect requiring clarification
- What you have already tried
- Context for your use case

**For collaboration proposals**:
- Brief description of your project
- How this work relates to your needs
- Proposed collaboration scope

## Response Time

Responses are typically provided within a few days.
